message.name: ERR_ERP_ADAPTER_ENABLED_BATCH_JOB
message.locale: ERP Adapter enabled, batch job was not executed.
ERP Adaptor enabled, batch job was not executed.

message.name: ERR_ERP_ADAPTER_ENABLED_CANNOT_EXECUTE_BATCH_JOB
message.locale: The ERP Adapter is enabled, batch job cannot be executed.
The ERP Adaptor is enabled, batch job cannot be executed.

message.name: ERR_ERP_ADAPTER_NOT_ENABLED_BATCH_JOB
message.locale: ERP Adapter not enabled, batch job was not executed.
ERP Adaptor not enabled, batch job was not executed.

message.name: ERR_ERP_ADAPTER_NOT_ENABLED_CANNOT_EXECUTE_BATCH_JOB
message.locale: Batch job cannot be executed as the ERP Adapter is not enabled.
Batch job cannot be executed as the ERP Adaptor is not enabled.

message.name: LIST_EXCLUDED_BATCH_JOBS
message.locale: ExpirePayments, GenerateInstruments, GeneralLedgerInterface, GeneratePayslips, IssueConcernPayments, LoadPaymentsReceived, PaymentReconciliation, ProcessPaymentInstrumentTypes, ReconcileCaseAccount
